original: intros Pcohial. apply alw_imp with (fun m q => exists i' j', [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely W2 this j j' & (exists q', q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v', q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))]). - intros s0 q0 ??. destruct (rely_ext i j s0) as [i' [j' [-> i'CohV]]]; auto. exists i', j'. split. + apply network_rely_W2_ext; eauto. + apply alw_coh' in H0 as (? & CohW). apply rely_split' in H3 as (? & ?); auto. destruct (H1 (i' \+ j') H2 q0 (alw_coh H0)). * move/coh_step: H4. set p0 := proj1_sig w. have stepn: network_step (Coh_proj p0 j) this j j'. by apply: step_coh. specialize (H1 i'CohV stepn q0). destruct H1 as [?[?[??]]|[?[??]]]. ++ left. exists x. split. ** now exists i', j'. ** auto. ++ right. now exists x0. * now right; eexists.
